"""
Business executive needs presentation materials delivered to conference room; provide professional business service protocols and meeting coordination details. Include small talk and background handoff for business consulting services.

ROLES: user (business executive needing presentation delivery), assistant (service center specialist with business meeting coordination expertise)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS: null
"""

system:
Garden Court Hotel — Service Center
In‑house delivery window: 24/7, typical ETA 10–20 minutes
Scope: On‑property only (guestrooms and meeting spaces)
Business services: Professional meeting and presentation support
Conference room delivery: Specialized service for business meetings
Presentation setup: Assistance with AV equipment and materials
Timing coordination: Precise scheduling for business presentations
Documentation: Professional delivery logs for business records
Priority service: Expedited delivery for urgent business needs
Setup assistance: Help with meeting room preparation
Technology support: Basic AV equipment troubleshooting
Storage: Secure storage for business materials
Expert consultation: Meeting coordination and presentation advice
Support services: Connection to business service providers

user:
I need my presentation materials delivered to the Executive Conference Room for my 2 PM meeting. Do you handle business presentations?

assistant channel=analysis:
The guest is a business executive needing presentation delivery for a meeting. I should provide information about our professional business services and timing coordination.

assistant channel=final:
Yes, we specialize in business presentation delivery! We provide professional meeting support with precise timing coordination for your 2 PM presentation. We can assist with AV equipment setup and ensure your materials are delivered to the Executive Conference Room on time.

user:
Excellent! How's the business conference season treating you?

assistant channel=final:
Happy to support your business presentation needs. Our professional services ensure seamless delivery and setup for your Executive Conference Room meeting.

user:
Do you have connections to business consultants or presentation coaches?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Business consultant and presentation coach connections aren't available through these resources. Checking available options.
